rComments: This class may seem very easy at first, but the finals will screw you over. Please do not take this class. The quizzes and essay are fairly easy, but like I said the final could drop your grade right off the bat. This professor says she does not trick people, but she does. Her finals ended up being 10 times harder than what she taught in class.

She was really enthusiastic about everything she taught. She's funny and she has a good personality; it made the class easier. Just remember to study for the tests and what she writes on the board? Write the stuff down.

Sloan was a great teacher and got really into the subject! She loves when people participate. She doesn't aim to make your life miserable, but she does give a few quizzes and requires a couple of short papers, but nothing too bad. I only had trouble with the midterm and final, but other than that the class was great.

Definitely worth taking as a filler-course. It is easy, low-maintenance and attendance is not required to receive a good grade. Do your work and study for exams and you will do just fine. As an instructor, she is competent and likable, though she obviously finds some of the material as monotonous as we do.
Very easy class as long as you do the assignments, which are easy.. Very little studying required for midterm. Also she let us out about 30 min early each class.

Great professor! Very helpful and a great TA as well. Sends all the slides to you via email. No section, very little homework and it is very easy. Don't buy the textbook it's only needed for the quizes which you can look up online or buy used/very cheaply. Midterm and Final are multiple choice and based on what she covers in class NOT the reading.

Lisa was an amazing teacher. The slides were a little hard to keep up with, but she was willing to slow things down according to student needs. Better to keep up with the textbook reading. Lisa was very understanding, passionate and knows her stuff. I would definitely recommend this class if interested in Earth Science or just an interesting GE

Scantron heaven for all you scantron lovers!  Hundreds of slides make it difficult to figure out what u *really* need to know for exams/quizzes that occur every 5th or 6th lecture.  Hard to take notes when there's a bajillion slides whipping by.  It gets posted afterward but, still.  That's no fun.

The class is ridiculously hard. In the class I had to learn tons of useless information and dates. Her midterms were very hard and the final worse. 110 accumulative questions. Really hard class. DON'T TAKE IT!!!! (unless you have to)
